description:
Means “work” in Japanese.  This Emoji used to mean “open for business” and precedes business hours.

CJK Ideographs are characters used in Chinese, Japanese and Korean languages. Their writing systems all completely or partly use Chinese characters.
apple_vendor_description: The Japanese 'Open for Business' button on Apple devices is a bright, inviting green circle, rendered with a smooth gradient and subtle 3D effect. Its clean, rounded edges and clear, crisp white Japanese characters communicate openness and welcome with a distinctly Apple aesthetic. This emoji is ideal for signifying that a business is currently open and ready to receive customers or inquiries.
